name: Doctors On Call, Inc.
description: Doctors On Call, Inc. is a telemedicine company revolutionizing the healthcare landscape by providing convenient and affordable virtual healthcare services. Established in 2015, the company aims to enhance access to medical professionals by connecting patients with licensed healthcare providers through an easy-to-use digital platform. By leveraging technology, Doctors On Call offers a range of services including virtual consultations, prescription management, and wellness programs. The platform is designed to cater to a diverse patient population, including those in remote areas, busy professionals, and individuals seeking immediate medical advice without the need to visit a physical clinic. The company also emphasizes preventative care, allowing users to monitor their health through digital tools and receive personalized health advice. With a dedicated team of healthcare professionals and a commitment to improving patient outcomes, Doctors On Call is at the forefront of the telehealth industry, responding to the growing demand for accessible healthcare solutions. The mission of Doctors On Call is to empower patients with the ability to manage their health effectively and efficiently, while fostering a healthcare system that prioritizes convenience and quality.

seo.meta_title: Doctors On Call, Inc. | Telemedicine and Virtual Healthcare Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Doctors On Call, Inc., a leader in telemedicine, providing innovative virtual healthcare solutions to enhance patient access and care.

faq.answer: Doctors On Call provides virtual consultations, prescription management, and wellness programs.

faq.answer: Doctors On Call was founded in 2015.
